title: Everything that Rises Must Converge mothers eyes

content.question: In the fourth paragraph (“She lifted . . . to town”), Julian’s thoughts about the contrast presented by his mother’s eyes suggest the presence of an overall contrast between her

choices.label: apparent superficiality and an underlying astuteness
conventional politeness and a manipulative disdain
preliminary enthusiasm and a subsequent reluctance
misleading frankness and a concealed secretiveness

content.answer: apparent superficiality and an underlying astuteness

skill.text: Skill 3.D: Explain the function of contrasts within a text.
